Don Santos de 65 años de edad, reside en Corinto departamento de Morazán, vive con su esposa y un hijo, se dedica a la reparación y venta de llantas, este negocio lo atiende hace 15 años, de 7:00am a 5:00pm, sus clientes son las personas que transitan por el lugar y vecinos.
Don Santos necesita compra llantas pero no dispone de dinero para realizar la compra, por lo que solicita un préstamo que le ayude a realizar la compra por lote ya que de esta forma es más cómodo los precios y le permite obtener mejores ganancias.
Su objetivo es velar por el mantenimiento del negocio, estar atento a la inversión continua al negocio para fortalecerlo y mantenerlo competente.
texts.en:
Santos is 65 years old and lives in Corinto, in Morazán department, with his wife and one child.  His business is repairing and selling tires.  He has been in this business for 15 years and works from 7.00am to 5.00pm.  His customers are passersby and neighbors. 

Santos needs to buy tires but he doesn't have the necessary money.  For this reason, he is requesting a loan that will help him to make a large purchase of tires.  This will enable him to buy at more affordable prices and thereby make more profit.

Santos' goal is to look after his business.  He plans to pay attention to the need to continually invest in his business in order to strengthen it and keep it running smoothly.

loans.use: To buy tires to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Tuition

loans.name: La Bendicion De Chajabal Group

texts.es: Doña Evelyn Yamilet TeC. Hernández, es una persona casada, ha cursado el sexto grado primaria, tiene 4  hijos los cuales siguen a su cargo, ella se dedica al comercio  tienda de consumo diario y también venta de concentrado para cerdos y pollos, tiene 10 años ya con este negocio. Contando con entusiasmo y la ayuda de algunas vecinas organizan un grupo, para poder solicitar un préstamo. El Grupo Solidario se denomina la Bendición de Chajabal, El grupo cuenta con cinco integrantes mujeres y un hombre, quienes se dedican a diversas actividades entre ellos podemos mencionar, la crianza de animales, servicio de veterinaria, venta de concentrado de cerdos, y venta de carne de pollo. El préstamo ella lo utilizará para compra de mercadería y así incrementar el volumen de ventas. Espera que su negocio sea más grande y productivo., con la ayuda del crédito que solicita en ASDIR.
texts.en:
Evelyn Yamilet TeC. Hernández is married and has four children in her care.  She studied up to the sixth year of elementary school.  Her business is a general store and she also sells concentrated pig and chicken feed.  She has been in this business for 10 years.

With enthusiasm and the help of some neighbors, she got together a group in order to be able to request a loan.  This community bank is called 'Bendición de Chajabal' (Chajabal Blessing)  The group is made up of five women and one man who all carry out different business activities such as raising animals, providing veterinarian services, selling concentrated pig feed and selling chicken.  Evelyn will use her loan to buy merchandise and thereby increase her sales volume.  She hopes to use her loan from ASDIR to help grow her business and make it more productive.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: María

texts.es:
María pertenece al banco comunal “Bannen” perteneciente a la ciudad de Lota. Ella se dedica a la confección y venta de tejidos a máquina en su misma casa, desde hace 20 años. Sus 2 hijas también trabajan con ella en este negocio.  Tiene como cliente fijo un colegio en donde entrega tejidos para los alumnos y muchos clientes particulares. Además María vende ropa de mujer.
Con este préstamo, María viajará a Santiago (capital de Chile) a comprar mercadería, es decir: lanas, hilos y ropa de mujer de verano.
Su sueño es comprar una máquina automática de tejido y una máquina semi industrial para  aumentar de esta manera su producción y alcanzar a más clientes.
María vive con sus 2 hijas y su esposo.
Para María los préstamos de Fondo Esperanza han sido un apoyo que le han permitido crecer en su negocio, ya que ha comprado algunas máquinas necesarias para sus tejidos y gracias a sus ganancias ha hecho arreglos en su casa.
Lota significa en mapudungun, idioma de nuestros indígenas mapuches, "pequeño lugarejo”. Es una comuna costera ubicada cerca de la ciudad de Concepción al sur de Chile, en la región del Bíobío. Lota es célebre por sus grandes yacimientos carboníferos muy ligados a la historia y desarrollo económico de Chile, así como por sus trabajadores de la minería subterránea, cuyas difíciles condiciones de vida fueron descritas por el escritor chileno Baldomero Lillo en su libro "Subterra".
texts.en:
María belongs to the "Bannen" community bank which is located in the town of Lota.  Her business is making and selling knitted garments.  She makes her products by machine in her own home.  She has been in this business for 20 years and her two daughters also work with her in the business.  One of her regular customers is a school to which she delivers knitted clothes for the students and she has many private customers.  María also sells women's clothes.

With this loan, María will travel to Santiago (the capital of Chile) to buy merchandise: yarn, threads and women's summer clothes.  Her dream is to buy an automatic knitting machine and a semi-industrial machine to increase her production and reach more customers.  María lives with her two daughters and her husband.

Fondo Esperanza's loans have helped support María and enabled her to grow in her business since she has used them to buy necessary machines for making her knitted products.  Thanks to the profits she has made, she has also been able to make repairs to her home.

Lota means 'small hamlet' in Mapudungun (the language of our indigenous Mapuche people).  It is a coastal town located near the city of Concepción, in the south of Chile, in Bíobío region.  Lota is famous for its large coalfields which are very much linked to Chile's history and economic development.  It is also known for the workers in its underground mining industry whose difficult living conditions were described by the Chilean writer Baldomero Lillo in his book "Subterra" (Below Ground).

loans.use: To buy merchandise: yarn, threads and clothes

loans.name: Julio Venjamin

texts.es: Julio es un hombre trabajador y luchador que goza de tener a su esposa y 6 hijos pero 3 no viven con él. Su actividad es la venta de plantas, negocio que inicio hace 4 años por iniciativa propia ya que necesitaba un medio para generar ingresos a su hogar y mantener a sus hijos, a pesar de que su mayor desafío ha sido organizar su tiempo, pues tiene que atender el negocio y realizar ciertas tareas del hogar para ayudar a su esposa. Es por eso que solicita este crédito con el fin de comprar una gran variedad de plantas pues tiene ciertos encargos de clientes que le realizan.
texts.en: Julio is a hardworking and persistent man who enjoys having a wife and 6 children.  Three of his children do not live with him.  He has a business selling plants which he started 4 years ago on his own initiative, since he needed to have a means to generate income for his household and to support his children.  His main challenge has been to organize his time, since he has to attend to the business and carry out certain household tasks to help out his wife.  He requests a loan to use to buy a large variety of plants, as he has some orders from customers that he needs to fulfill.

loans.use: working capital - to buy plants

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Doña María Elena R. R. es empleada de una empresa de acueductos y alcantarillado desde hace 2 años, donde ocupa el cargo de Electricista Industrial.

Es soltera de 20 años de edad, no tiene ninguna persona a su cargo, ella vive en el Departamento de Managua en el Municipio de Ciudad Sandino, desde hace 20 años.

Este crédito lo solicita para cubrir gestiones personales, agradece CEPRODEL por este primer crédito que le otorgaron ya que lo necesitaba.
texts.en:
María Elena R. R. has worked as an industrial electrician for a water and sewage company for 2 years.  

She is single, 20 years old, and has no dependents.  She has lived in the municipality of Ciudad Sandino in the department of Managua all her life.

She requests this loan to cover some personal expenses.  She is grateful to CEPRODEL for this first loan, and because they granted her the loan when she needed it.

loans.use: personal use

loans.name: Martin José

texts.es: El Sr. Martin José R. R. él es trabajador activo de la empresa de Enacal Carazo desempeñándose como operador de equipo  tiene  treinta y un   años de trabajar para esta institución es casado actualmente. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como, Arena, Cemento, piedra, piedrín etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Martin José R. R. is employed by the company Enacal Carazo.  He has worked there as an equipment operator for 31 years.  He is married.

He has taken 2 loans previously with CEPRODEL, and with each one he has bought construction materials such as sand, cement, stones, gravel, etc., to use to expand and improve his home.  These loans have benefited him greatly, since through these means he has improved the living conditions for himself and his family.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, stone and gravel

loans.name: Didies Manuel

texts.es:
Don Didies Manuel G. S., es empleado de una empresa de acueductos y Alcantarillado, desde hace 6 años, ocupando el cargo de Operador de Pozo.

Es Acompañado, de 39 años de edad, tiene una persona menor de 15 años que depende de él. Vive en la ciudad de Managua, en el Municipio de Managua desde hace 15 años.

Agradece a CEPRODEL por darle este préstamo que es el primero, ya que esto le ayudará a mejorar su vivienda y por lo tanto incrementar su calidad de vida y la de su familia
texts.en:
Mr. Didies Manuel G. S. has been employed by by an aqueduct and sewer system company for six years, and works as a well operator. He is 39 years old and is responsible for a young person under 15 years of age. He has lived in the city of Managua, in the municipality of Managua, for 15 years.

He is thankful to CEPRODEL for giving him his first loan, as it will help him improve his home and improve his quality of life and that of his family.

loans.use: Housing improvements

loans.name: Marcos Antonio

texts.es: Marcos Antonio trabaja actualmente en su vivienda se dedica a la venta de carne. Vive con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, la mayoría de sus clientes siempre llegan a su vivienda por el buen servicio la calidad que le brinda además Marcos ha sido un hombre muy emprendedor que disfruta de este medio de vida.  El sale todos los días temprano a ofrecer este producto a cierto clientes también sus hijos le ayudan a realizar ciertas ventas. El solicita este crédito para compra de una gran variedad de carne, el sueño de él es poder terminar la construcción de un local adecuado.
texts.en: Marcos Antonio currently works in his home selling meat. He lives with his wife and his four children. The majority of his customers always come to his home for the good service and the quality that he offers. Besides, Marcos has been a very hard working man that enjoys this way of life. He goes out early every morning to offer his product to certain customers. Also, his children help him with some of his sales. He is asking for this loan to purchase a large variety of meat. His dream is to be able to complete the construction of an adequate store.

loans.use: Money for work

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Home improvement

loans.name: Jorge Luis

texts.es: El Sr. Jorge Luis V. M. él es trabajador activo de la empresa de Enacal San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Operador de Pozo  tiene  diez  años  de trabajar para esta institución es acompañado actualmente, tiene dos hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  Seis créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Jorge Luis V. M. is an active worker in the business of "Enacal San Rafael del Sur". He works as a well operator. He has been working for this institution for 10 years. He is currently in a relationship. He has two children who are of school age. He has had six loans through CEPRODEL and each one has helped him to buy construction materials like sand, cement, rocks, stones, blocks, etc. to enlarge and improve his house. The loans with CEPRODEL have helped him in a great way since in this way he has improved his family's way of life.

loans.use: Sand, Cement, Rocks, Stones, Blocks

loans.name: Maluay De Curiquinga (Cuenca) Group

texts.es:
El banco comunal Maluay de Curiquingue esta conformado por 14 socias alegres, positivas y trabajadoras quienes día a día luchan en sus diferentes actividades para sacar  adelante a sus familias. Nuestras socias viven por el sector de Maluay, este lugar  es conocido por la belleza de su naturaleza, la paz y la tranquilidad.  Su gente se dedica a la cría de animales y agricultura, también muchos trabajan en la ciudad en diferentes actividades.

La Señora. Narcisa Domínguez es socia del banco comunal Maluay de Curiquinga, vive en la comunidad de Maluay, tiene 24 años, es casada y tiene  2 hijos de 7 y 2 años de edad, su primer hijo estudia en una escuelita de la comunidad. Su esposo labora realizando estucos (cielos rasos) y tiene un pequeño taller, no tiene casa propia por lo que vive en la casa de unos familiares. 
Doña Narcisa se dedica a los quehaceres domésticos de su hogar debido a que sus hijos aun son pequeños, pero se dedica a la cría de animales como: pollos, cuyes y cerdos, los que vende en su comunidad y hay veces que también son para su consumo.
Es su cuarto crédito que realiza en el banco comunal y lo va a invertir en la compra de pollos. Su meta es tener su casa propia. 

La Señora. Blanca S. es socia del banco comunal Maluay de Curiquinga, vive en la comunidad de Maluay. Este es el primer crédito que realiza en el banco comunal, fue invitada por su cuñada. 
Tiene 42 años, es casada y tiene 5 hijos de 18, 17, 12, 11 y 9 años de edad, sus dos primeros hijos trabajan y ayudan en la economía de su hogar, su hijo de 12 años pasa en casa, sus dos últimos hijos estudian en una escuelita del sector. Su esposo es albañil y con el trabajo de los dos han logrado construir su casa propia. 
Doña Blanca se dedica a la elaboración de sombreros de paja toquilla los que son tejidos por sus manos, realiza esta labor desde que tenía 10 años siendo sus padres quienes le enseñaron este arte.  
Su crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de paja toquilla. Su meta es  tener un criadero de animales.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Maluay de Curiquingue" is made up of 14 happy, positive, and hard working members. Every day, they fight in their different activities to improve the way of life of their families. OUr memvers live in the sector of Maluay. This place is known for natural beauty, peace, and tranquility. Its people are dedicated to the upbringing of animals and agriculture. Also, many work in the city doing different activities.

Mrs. Narcisa Domínguez is a member of the "Maluay de Curiquinga" communal bank. She lives in the community of Maluay. She is 24 years old, is married, and has 2 children who are 7 and 2 years old. Her first son studies at a small school in the community. Her husband plasters ceilings and has a small workshop. She doesn't have her own home, which is why she lives in a relative's home.
Narcisa works as a homemaker since her children are still small. But she also raises animals like chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs, which she sells in her community. There are times that they are for their consumptions, as well.
This is her fourth loan through the communal bank, and she is going to use it to buy chickens. Her goal is to have her own house. 
 
Mrs. Blanca S. is a member of the "Maluay de Curiquinga" communal bank. She lives in the community of Maluay. This is her first loan through the communal bank. She was invited by her sister-in-law.
She is 42 years old, is married, and has 5 children who are 18, 17, 12, 11, and 9 years old. Her first two children work and help in the economy of her home. Her 12 year old son stays at home, and her last two children study in a small area school. Her husband is a construction worker. With both of their work, they have been able to build their own home.
Blanca decorates straw hats, which are woven by her hands. She has been doing this work since she was 10 years old. It was her parents who taught her this art.
Her loan will be invested in the purchase of straw. Her goal is to have an animal farm.

loans.use: To buy chickens and straw

loans.name: Las Rosarinas Group

texts.es:
Ya son 20 años que la Sra. Melita se dedica al oficio D. la costura, ella tiene el negocio en su misma casa fueron sus abuelos quienes le inculcaron  el trabajo ellos tenían un taller D. costura y aun recuerda  cuando era niña y se portaban mal su abuelo en forma D. castigo la hacia trabajar volteando el cuello D. las camisas o  planchando los bolsillos D. los pantalones, así fue aprendiendo ya jovencita deciD.  perfeccionarse y estudiar,  al casarse  compro su casa y vio que en el lugar no había ningún taller D. costura  pensó que seria una buena idea  debido a que esa zona recién se estaba poblando  no se equivoco  ella reconoce que su trabajo le ha brindado mucha tranquilidad para solventar los gastos D. la familia  ahora mas que nunca debido a la repentina enfermedad D. su esposo es ella quien solventa todo y se las ingenia para  hacer D. todo, actualmente esta inmersa en la campaña escolar confeccionando uniformes y  buzos escolares  ella  hace los uniformes para 2 colegios, su préstamo lo usara para comprar telas  para confeccionar buzos,  lo que mas desea en el futuro es acondicionar un lugar en su casa para  poner un taller mas granD. con atención al publico y sobretodo  comprar maquinas industriales ya que su meta es abastecer a todos los colegios D. la zona donD. vive, La Sra. Melita es miembro del grupo “LAS ROSARINAS”  es la tesorera del grupo que  esta formado por 8 socias .

* la Sra Melita esta sentada con blusa roja.
texts.en:
For the past 20 years Melita has worked as a seamstress in her own house.  Her grandparents were the ones who started her in the business because they have a workshop. She even remembers that when she was a child and didn’t behave, her grandfather punished her by making her turn the shirt collars or iron the pants pockets.  This was how she learned, and as a young girl, she decided to study and perfect the traD..  When she married, she bought a house and saw that there was no other tailor shop in the area, and she thought it would be a good idea to put one in since the area was starting to increase in population.  She wasn’t wrong and she recognizes that her work has offered her the ability to pay the family expenses, especially because of the sudden illness of her husband.  Melita is the one who pays all and figures out how to handle everything.  Currently she is making school uniforms and sweatsuits for 2 schools.  She will use the loan to buy fabric to make sweatsuits.  What she would like most in the future is to fix up a place in her house where she can put a bigger workshop for the public and especially to buy industrial sewing machines since her goal is to produce the uniforms for all the schools in the area where she lives.  Melita is a member of the 8-person group “Las Rosarinas”.  She is the treasurer.  
*In the photo she is sitting and wearing a red blouse.

loans.use: Fabric to make sweatsuits

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Improve his home.

loans.name: Santos Humberto

texts.es: El Sr. Santos Humberto E. él es trabajador activo de la empresa Alcaldía Municipal de San Rafael del Sur desempeñándose como Operario de Mantenimiento  tiene  dos  años  de trabajar para esta institución es acompañado actualmente, tiene dos hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y uno lo  realizo para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo esta solicitando para la compra de una cabeza de ganado, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Señor Santos Humberto E. is an active worker for the municipal office of Sal Rafael del Sur, where he is a maintenance worker. He has worked for this institution for two years. He is married and has two children of school age. He has had two loans with CEPRODEL. He took out one loan to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, crushed rock, cement blocks, etc, to enlarge and improve his home. He is applying for this loan to purchase a head of cattle. The loans from CEPRODEL have benefited him greatly, and in this way he has improved his living conditions and those of his family.

loans.use: Buy a head of cattle

loans.name: Merceditas

texts.es: Mercedes tiene 64 años, su actividad es la venta de cerdos. Hace más de 12 años que tiene este negocio, inicio con ciertos ahorros que inicio este arduo trabajo pues siempre le ha gustado ser una mujer muy independiente. La mayoría de sus clientes le solicitan buena calidad ya que siempre ha disfrutado de obtener este medio de vida. Este crédito es para la compra de cerdos ya que son necesarios para mantener a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Mercedes is 64 years old.  She sells pigs and has been in the business for more than 12 years.  She started out in this business with some savings that she had since she has always enjoyed being a very independent woman.  Most of her customers request good-quality products from her.  She has always enjoyed being in this trade.

Mercedes will use this loan to buy pigs since they are necessary if she wants to keep serving her customers.

loans.use: Working capital

loans.name: Martha Celsa

texts.es:
Martha nació en el Dpto. de Ancash, desde muy pequeña fue  muy trabajadora, ayudaba a su mama en todos  los quehaceres del hogar. Es soltera, tiene 2 hijos menores, vive en la Zona de Ampliación Villa el Polvorín, distrito de Carabayllo. 
Trabajó ayudando a su tía en la venta de productos de belleza, como veía que le iba bien en las ventas, decidió vendar por su cuenta, ahora lleva dos años en el negocio, gracias a esos ingresos pudo pagar sus primeros ciclos en  el Instituto IDAT.(lugar donde estudia), actualmente ella trabaja como enfermera, cuidando a un anciano.
Su sueño o meta es ser profesional para poder apoyar a sus hijos y tener su puesto para cualquier negocio. 
Con el préstamo solicitado desea cancelar su último ciclo de la Carrera Enfermería Técnica.
texts.en: Martha was born in the Ancash department. Since she was very small, she was always hard-working. She helped her mother with all the house work. She is single and has two small children. She lives in the area of Ampliacion Villa el Polvorin, district of Carabayllo. She worked helping her aunt selling beauty products. In her opinion, she did well in sales. She decided to sell on her own and now she has two years experience with her business. Thanks to this income, she was able to pay for her first cycles at the IDAT Institute (the place where she studies). Currently, she works as a nurse, taking care of an elderly person. Her dream or goal is to be a professional so that she can support her children and have a place with whatever business. With the loan she is requesting, she wishes to cancel her last cycle at the Carrera Enfermeria Tecnica.

loans.use: Complete her last stage at the Carrera Enfermeria Tecnica.

loans.name: Jawas Pankarita Group

texts.es:
La Asociación Comunal “JAWAS PANKARITA” (en idioma Aymara quiere decir Flor de Haba) iniciará su  ciclo número catorce en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de German Busch.  Estas señoras  se han reunido para solicitar crédito y recibir servicios en salud y capacitación. Siendo una asociación comunal con recorrido, se observa que varias de las socias son antiguas, pero tambien hay socias con pocos ciclos o son nuevas. Las asociación comunal "Jawas Pankarita" está compuesta por ocho integrantes, en la foto se ven diez personas, porque, la señora de chamarra ploma que se encuentra al fondo y la señora de manta a cuadros ploma y blanca, pollera rosada, son socias que este ciclo descansarán. 

Los negocios que ellas desempeñan son variados:  costura de ropa, elaboración de enaguas, venta de Batidos, tejido y trensado, comercio de mantas, venta de mantas y alfombras, hilado de lana y alpaca.

La A.C. “JAWAS PANKARITA” está dirigida por una mesa directiva, la señora Gladys es la presidenta, la señora Lidia es la tesorera y la señora Verónica es la secretaria de actas. 
La señora Gladys, presidenta de la banca comunal, indica que ya tiene seis ciclos como socia de Pro Mujer.  Conoció de los servicios de la institución a través de su mamá.    Su negocio es la venta mantas y alfombras, desempeña este trabajo desde hace cinco años.  La venta de su mercadería se realiza los días jueves y domingo de 9 de la mañana hasta las 9 de noche.
El crédito solicitado le servirá para la compra de mercadería y así surtir su puesto.
texts.en:
The community association "JAWAS PANKARITA” (in Aymara language this means bean flower) will begin its 14th cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the 
Centro Focal de German Busch.These women have met to request a loan and receive health and training services. Being a community association with experience, one may observe that many of the members are older but also there are members with few cycles or who are new. The community association "Jawas Pankarita" is made up of 8 members. In the photo, you see ten people because the woman with the feather jacket that is at the back and the woman in the checkered cape and pink skirt are members who recently retired.

The businesses that they work at are various: making clothing, underskirts, selling milkshakes, braided fabric, blankets, rugs, wool and alpaca yarn.

The A.C. “JAWAS PANKARITA” is directed by a board. Gladys is the president. Lidia is the treasurer and Veronica is the secretary. Gladys, president of the community bank, indicates that she already has six cycles as a member of Pro Mujer. She learned about the services of the institution through her mother. Her business is selling blankets and carpets. She's worked at this job for five years. She sells her merchandise on Thursdays and Sundays from 9AM until 9PM. The loan requested will be used to buy merchandise and stock her store.

loans.use: Compra de mantas y alfomfras

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Medical expenses for his wife

loans.name: Rosa Damari

texts.es: Rosa Damari tiene 34 años, vive en su casa propia, tiene 2 hijos menores de edad a su cargo. Ella ofrece a sus amigas los productos necesarios y dice que aunque sus ganancias son regulares le sirven apara ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar. Su actividad es la venta y compra de cosméticos. Como es una mujer muy emprendedora para el futuro tiene pensado mejorar su actividad. Ella tiene tiempo de trabajar con Fundación y promete pagar sus cuotas puntualmente como siempre ya que no quiere quedar mal con las personas que hicieron posible este aporte que le permitirá continuar trabajando en busca del progreso. Rosa tiene planeado invertir el crédito solicitado en la compra de pintura de labios, pintura de uñas, lápiz labial, tratamientos entre otros.
texts.en: Rosa Damari is 34 years of age.  She lives in her own house and has 2 young children in her care.  She offers necessary products to her friends and says that although her earnings are regular they help her husband with the household expenses.  Her activity is buying and selling cosmetics.  As she is a very enterprising and forward looking woman, she wants to improve her business.  She has worked with Fundación for some time and promises to make her payments on time as always since she does not want to leave a bad impression with the people that have made this support possible which will permit her to continue working in search of progress.  Rosa has planned to invest the requested loan in lip gloss, lipstick, nail polish and other such items.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics for resale

loans.name: Teodora

texts.es: Teodora, de 60 años, es una mujer responsable y muy amorosa. Hace algún tiempo se separó de su esposo con el que tiene un hijo; que junto a su nieta viven en su casa propia ubicada en Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Todas las mañanas, desde las primeras horas del día, los pobladores de su localidad salen a comprar los alimentos que expende en su bodega, negocio que acondicionó en su casa desde hace algunos años. Pero la actividad que más disfruta Teodora, es la agricultura, siendo sus principales cultivos el café y el plátano. Ya tiene 40 años dedicándose a ello, y según afirma es una buena terapia, “descanso en la tranquilidad del campo”, afirma. Sus planes son adquirir sus propios terrenos de cultivo, para poder minimizar los gastos de alquiler. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde está segura saldrá adelante. Teodora cada semana surte su tienda de comestibles, por ello con el crédito que solicita, piensa comprar sacos de azúcar, arroz, fideos y demás productos comestibles para vender en su localidad.
texts.en: Teodora, at 60 years of age, is a responsible and loving woman.  For some time she has been separated from her husband with whom she had a son.  Along with her granddaughter they live in their own house located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central forest).  Every morning, from the first hours of the day, the people of their leave to buy food that she offers in her store; a business that she has run from her home for several years. But the activity that Teodora enjoys most is agriculture, with coffee and bananas being her main crops.  She has already been dedicated to this for 40 years and affirms that it is good therapy. "Rest in the tranquility of the field", she says.  Her plans are to acquire her own lands for cultivation, to be able to minimize the expenses of rent.  She belongs to the “Prestarios de la Unión” communal bank and this is the first loan that she has had with MFP, where she is sure she will do well.  Teodora supplies her store with food each week.  With the loan that she requests she plans to buy bags of sugar, rice, noodles and other edible products to sell in her location.

loans.use: To buy products such as rice, sugar, and noodles to supply her convenience store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to remodel his house

loans.name: Tito

texts.es: Tito, de 59 años, es un hombre maduro y muy serio. Su familia consta de su esposa Sara y sus 4 hijos, todos ellos mayores de edad. Ahora él vive solo con su esposa  y su nieto Jesús, en su casa propia, ubicada la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). A pesar de su avanzada edad, esté hombre trabaja arduamente para sacar adelante a su nieto, ya que su papá murió, y él, es el único que se dedica de su educación y sus cuidados. El principal sustento de Tito, es la agricultura, ahí siembra café y plátanos, desde hace 20 años. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es embolsar las plantitas de café, esperando con ansias poder transplantarlos a los terrenos agrícolas. Asimismo, le gusta negociar sus granos de café, ya que recibirá la recompensa de muchos meses de trabajo y sacrificio. En adelante planea ahorrar el dinero suficiente para poder pagar los estudios de su nieto. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde está seguro podrá obtener muchos logros. Tito, dentro de muy poco comenzará la cosecha de café, por ello con el crédito que solicita,  invertirá en la compra de materiales necesarios para levantar un pequeño campamento entre sus cultivos, y de esa manera acelerar el proceso de recolección.
texts.en: Tito, age 59 years, is a mature and very serious man.  His family is comprised of his wife, Sara, and their 4 children, all of legal age.  Now he lives alone with his wife and his grandson, Jesus, in his own house, located the Unión Palomar community (Peruvian central forest).  In spite of his advanced age, this man works arduously to help his grandson get ahead, since his grandson's father died, and Tito is the only one who is dedicated to caring for him and his education.  Tito's main occupation is agriculture.  He has grown coffee and bananas for 20 years. What he likes most about his work is to pot the young coffee plants, hoping with anxiety to be able to transplant them to the agricultural lands.  Likewise, he likes to negotiate for the sales of the coffee beans, since then he will receive the reward of many months of work and sacrifice.  In the future he plans to save sufficient money to be able to pay for his grandson's education.  He belongs to the "Borrowers of the Union" communal bank, and this is his first loan that he has had with MFP, where he is sure will be able to obtain many achievements.  Tito, will soon begin a new coffee crop.  Because of this with the credit that he requests, he will invest in the purchase of the necessary materials to raise a small camp among his cultivations, and in that way to accelerate the process of harvesting.

loans.use: To buy materials to raise a camp inside his agricultural fields.

loans.name: Orencia

texts.es: Orencia, de 46 años, es una mujer trabajadora y alegre. Su familia lo conforma su esposo Roberto y sus 3 hijos, a los que ama mucho; juntos viven en su casa propia, ubicada en Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como esposos, amigos y socios, Orencia, puso una tienda de comestibles, donde todas las mañanas, vende productos de primera necesidad, mientras que su esposo “Lolo”, así lo llama de cariño, trabaja en sus terrenos agrícolas, desde hace 30 años. Sus principales cultivos constan de café y palta y lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder compartir los gastos familiares entre los dos, pues así logran desarrollarse juntos. Los planes de está pareja es poder obtener un buen grano de café, por ello están trabajando arduamente para está campaña agrícola, donde comercializan sus granos a la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, obteniendo ganancias de acuerdo a la calidad del café. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde desea salir adelante en compañía de su asociación. Orencia, constantemente tiene que surtir su tienda de comestibles, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará gran cantidad de productos de primera necesidad, y si el dinero le alcanza lo invertirá en la compra de varios sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en: Orencia, age 46, is a happy and hard-working woman.  Her family is comprised of her husband, Roberto, and their 3 children, who she loves very much.  Together they live in their own house, located in Unión Palomar (Peruvian central forest).  As a couple, friends and associates, Orencia and her husband began a food store 30 years ago, where every morning she sells basic supplies, while her husband "Lolo", as she affectionately calls him, works in their agricultural fields.  Their main cultivations are comprised of coffee and avocado and what she likes most is to be able to share the family expenses between the two of them.  Thus they manage to develop together.  The plans of this couple are to be able to obtain a good coffee crop.  Because of this they are working arduously for this agricultural campaign, where they market their grains to the cooperative of Alto Palomar, obtaining profits according to the quality of the coffee.  She belongs to the "Borrowers of the Union" communal bank and this is the first loan that she has had with MFP, where she desires to do well in the company of her association.  Orencia constantly has to supply her food store.  With the loan that she requests, she will buy a great quantity of staple products, and, if the money is sufficient, she will also invest in the purchase of several bags of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy products to supply her store as well as sacks of fertilizer

loans.name: Ana Cecilia

texts.es:
La señora Ana Cecilia Rodríguez Sánchez  está solicitando este préstamo para poner piso de concreto en la parte de enfrente de su casa, ya que cuando llueve se pone muy lodoso y esto provoca que haiga humedad y se vuelva poco saludable para la familia.

Debido a que ella no cuenta con un empleo su esposo el Señor Ulises Vicente Pérez es el que  mantiene a la familia, su empleo como Tramitador en la Agencia Aduanal Miner es sólido porque cuenta con varios años de antigüedad y debido a esto el podrá pagar el adeudo.
Ellos forman una familia de cinco integrantes y con la ayuda de este préstamo podrán brindarles un mejor patrimonio a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Ana Cecilia Rodríguez Sánchez is requesting this loan to build a concrete floor at the front of her house, because when it rains, the area becomes very muddy and retains humidity, which is unhealthy for the family. 

Since she does not have a job, her husband, Ulises Vicente Pérez, is the one who supports the family. He works as a clerk at the Miner Customs Agency, which is steady work, because he has been with the company for several years, and thanks to this, he will be able to pay the debt. 

They make up a family with five members, and with the help of this loan, they will be able to provide a better standard of living for their children.

loans.use: Building a concrete floor at the entry of her house

loans.name: Milka

texts.es: Milka, de 20 años, es una luchadora madre soltera. Ella vive con su hija, en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la comunidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como mujer joven, ella tiene muchas ambiciones, hace 2 años su padre le heredó un terreno agrícola, con el que comenzó a sembrar café, ahora ella tiene unos cafetales jóvenes, que le proporcionan buenos granos. Aprovechando esa ventaja, manda a procesar el grano, vendiendo el café natural en grandes cantidades, a las diferentes tiendas de la ciudad de La Merced, donde tiene clientes fijos. Lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder ser independiente y tener oportunidad de crecer, pues a pesar de sus limitaciones y responsabilidades, ella no se amilana, por el contrario; tiene deseos de estudiar, y poder tener una empresa exportadora de café. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP, donde encontró el apoyo que tanto necesitaba. Milka muy pronto cosechará sus grano de café, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, con lo que estará lista para los próximos meses de cosecha.
texts.en: Milka who is 20 years old is a hard-working single mother. She lives with her daughter in her parents' house located in the community of Union Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). As a young woman, she has many ambitions. Two years ago, she inherited farming land from her father with which she began to sow coffee. Now, she has young coffee plants that provide good kernals. Exploiting this advantage, she sends the grain to be processed, selling natural coffee in great quantities to the different shops in the city of La Merced where she has fixed clients. What she likes the most is to be able to be independent and have the opportunity to grow. Despite her limitations and responsibilities, she is not daunted. On the contrary, she has desires to study and to be able to have a coffee exportation business. She belongs to the "Prestatarios de la Union" community bank and this is the first loan that she's had with MFP where she found the support that she needed so much. Milka very soon will harvest her coffee grains. For this, with the loan she's requesting, she will buy various bags of organic fertilizer, with which she will be ready for the next months of harvest.

loans.use: Purchase bags of fertilizer.

loans.name: Carlos Jose

texts.es: Carlos José tiene su negocio que es la venta de leña. Hace más 20 años que tiene este negocio, ya que siempre le ha gustado trabajar ya que tiene 1 hijo menor de edad que tiene que hacerse cargo. Inicio por su Papa que le enseño a sobrevivir con este negocio, ya que la mayoría de los hogares no tiene muchos recursos para comprar gas y la leña que es necesaria. El financiamiento es para la compra de leña que es necesaria para su negocio.
texts.en: Carlos José has his own business selling firewood. He has run the business for over 20 years. He has always liked working and especially because he has a young dependent child. He started out thanks to his dad, who taught him to survive with this business. Most homes do not have the resources to buy gas and firewood is a necessity. This loan will be used to buy firewood, which is essential for his business.

loans.use: Purchase of firewood

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María, de 55 años, es una mujer trabajadora y responsable. A pesar de la separación que tiene con su esposo, ella sigue trabajando en conjunto para poder cuidar de sus 2 hijas; con quienes viven en la comunidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). El trabajo al que se dedica es la “agricultura”, ya tiene 33 años dedicándose al cultivo de la tierra. Lo que más le gusta a ella es la dedicación que le brindan sus hijas, ya que la ayudan a cuidar, limpiar y abonar sus cultivos; que constan en su mayoría de café, el cual después de su cosecha lo comercializa en la Cooperativa de Alto Palomar. Pero lo que le genera ganancias diarias pero menos rentables; son sus cultivos de plátanos y palta, los que cada 15 días los comercializa en  Paucartambo, que es un anexo comercial. Por el futuro de sus hijas, está planeando mejorar sus cultivos de café, para que puedan tener mayor demanda. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que tiene con MFP; donde se compromete a trabajar por el desarrollo de su asociación. María dentro de muy poco cosechará café, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico.
texts.en:
María, age 55, is a hardworking and responsible woman. Despite being separated, she and her husband continue to work together to support their two daughters with whom she lives in the community of Unión Palomar in the central Peruvian jungle. María has been farming on her land for 33 years. What she enjoys most is the dedication that her daughters provide since they help care for and fertilize the crops, which consists mostly of coffee. After harvesting, the crops are sold at the Alto Palomar cooperative. Her daily earnings are more or less profitable from her crops of bananas and avocados that are harvested and sold in Paucartambo every fifteen days at a commercial annex. For the future of her daughters, she plans to improve her coffee crops since they have greater demand.

María belongs to the Communal Bank “Prestatrios de la Unión” (Borrowers of the Union) and this is her first loan with MFP. She promises to work toward the development of her group. María will be harvesting her coffee shortly, so she is requesting a loan to buy several sacks of organic fertilizer.

loans.use: Purchase sacks of organic fertilizer

loans.name: Ricardo José

texts.es:
Ricardo labora como vigilante y es casado tiene 4 personas a su cargo es el primer desembolso que CEPRODEL le otorga, para compra de útiles escolares de sus hijos y matricula de los muchachos.

Agradece a CEPRODEL  por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Ricardo works as a security guard. He is married and has four people under his care. This is the first loan that has been granted to him by CEPRODEL. Ricardo will use the funds to buy school supplies for his children as well as pay for their tuition.

He is grateful to CEPRODEL for its support.

loans.use: Pay tuition & purchase shoes, uniforms, and school supplies for his children

loans.name: Cliber

texts.es: Cliber, de 38 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador que vive en compañía de su mamá Clara y su padre Magno; a quien protege y cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la comunidad Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). Como técnico Agropecuario, él tiene muchos proyectos, su mayor desea es mejorar la calidad de sus cultivos, con miras a la exportación, pues su especialidad son proyectos productivos. Eso lo demuestra en sus cultivos de café, donde aplica todos sus conocimientos, por ello en cada cosecha vende su grano a la cooperativa de Alto Palomar, asimismo siembra plátanos como un producto alternativo, asegurando así su economía. Cada 15 días recoge los frutos maduros para comercializarlos. Ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a esto, pero según menciona antes no tenia el conocimiento que ahora posee, por ello está seguro que logrará su objetivo. Él pertenece al banco comunal “Prestatarios de la Unión”, y este es el primer crédito que  tiene con MFP, donde se compromete a ser puntual en las actividades que realizarán en su asociación. Cliber menciona que en estos meses las lluvias son cada vez más intensas, por ello con el crédito que solicita, comprará varios sacos de abono orgánico, como también dedicarse al cuidado de sus cultivos por las intensas plagas que azotan en estos tiempos.
texts.en:
Cliber, age 38, is a single hardworking man who lives with his mother Clara and father Magno who he protects and cares for in his own home in the community of Unión Palomar in the central Peruvian jungle. Working as a technical farmer, Cliber has many projects. His greatest wish is to improve the quality of his crops that are designated for export. He specializes in productive projects, such as his coffee crop in which he applies all of his knowledge. With each harvest, Cliber sells his grain to the Alto Palomar cooperative where he also sells bananas as an alternative product that helps secure his income. Every fifteen days he gathers the ripened fruit to sell. Cliber has been in this business for twenty years and says that he did not have the knowledge that he now possesses to help him achieve his goal.

Cliber belongs to the Communal Bank “Prestatrios de la Unión” (Borrowers of the Union) and this is his first loan with MFP. He promises to be punctual in his group activities. Cliber says that the rain has been intense in recent months. For this reason, the loan he requested will be used to buy several sacks of organic compost. In addition, part of the loan will used to protect his crops from the intense infestation of pests that can occur during times like these.

loans.use: Purchase sacks of compost & supplies to protect against pests

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco tiene 54 años, su actividad económica es destace de cerdos. Hace más de 30 años que se dedica a este negocio, a Francisco le gusta su actividad, por lo que labora con este negocio para incrementar sus ingresos ya que poco a poco ha mejorado su vivienda y además que todos en su comarca lo conocen, pues el servicio que ofrece es el mejor y la comunicación con sus clientes es la mejor. Es por eso que solicita este financiamiento que es para capital de trabajo y comprar cerdos y pago de transporte. Francisco sueña con proporcionarle mejoras a su vivienda pues su techo tiene algunos desperfectos.
texts.en:
Francisco is 54 years old and has a business butchering pigs. He has been in this business for more than 30 years and enjoys what he does. Francisco works in his business so that he can increase his income and gradually make improvements to his home. Everyone in the region knows him since he provides the best service and communicates well with his customers.

He is requesting this loan to use as operating capital to acquire pigs and pay to have them transported. Francisco hopes to make repairs to the roof of his home since it has a few defects.

loans.use: Operating capital to acquire pigs

loans.name: San Roque Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “SAN ROQUE”  iniciará su ciclo número uno en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana,  se han reunido 8 mujeres para solicitar crédito y recibir servicios en salud y capacitación. Siendo una asociación comunal que se reúne por primera vez,  se observa entusiasmo y al mismo tiempo varias de las socias manifiestan timidez. 
Los negocios que ellas desempeñan son variados: venta de productos de limpieza, costura de bolsas, venta de comida, venta de Wallake (caldo de pescado llamado Karachi), venta de paja, costura de camperas, pasanaquera, venta de comida.

La A.C. “San Roque” está dirigida por una mesa directiva, la señora Ana María es la presidenta, la señora Sofía es la tesorera y la señora Flora es la secretaria de actas. 

La señora  Ana María, presidenta de la banca comunal, es una mujer joven de 27 años de edad, aún no ha formalizado la relación con su pareja, tiene un niño pequeño y está en espera de un segundo bebé.   La señora Ana María aprendió costura hace  varios años en el vecino país de la Argentina, el crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de una máquina de costura recta.  Por ahora su trabajo consiste en la costura, sus clientes le entregan piezas cortadas y ella devuelve el producto terminado.  Cuando su trabajo aumenta le ayudan sus hermanos.

Cuando se le consulta a la señora  Ana María qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde:  “el ahorro y la caja chica”.
texts.en:
The San Roque Communal Association is starting its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Panamericana Community Center. The group consists of eight women who have joined together to request a loan as well as receive health services and training. Being a Communal Association that is meeting for the first time, the group is observed to have enthusiasm even though some of the members display shyness.

Several types of businesses are represented: selling cleaning products, handmade purses, food, Wallake (a fish stew also called “Karachi”), straw, handmade jackets, and general merchandise. The San Roque Communal Association is led by its Board of Directors: Sra. Ana María (President), Sra. Sofía (Treasurer), and Sra. Flora (Secretary of Records).

Sra. Ana María serves as the Communal Bank president. She is a young woman who is 27 years of age. Even though she has not formalized the relationship with her partner, they have a young son and hope to have a second child. Sra. Ana María learned how to sew several years ago in the neighboring country of Argentina. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy an upright sewing machine. Today her work consists of sewing for her customers who bring her cut pieces and she is in charge of making the finished product. When her workload increases, she has the help of her siblings.

When asked what she likes most about Pro Mujer, Sra. Ana María responded with “the savings and having available cash”.

loans.use: Purchase a sewing machine

loans.name: Dios Nos Guia Group

texts.es: Maria De Los Ángeles y Ángela Mercedes, conforman el grupo solidario Dios Nos Guía. Ángela se dedica a la venta de dulces, desde hace más de 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad, todos los días sale a ofrecerlos en las calles con mucho esfuerzo. En cambio Maria De Los Ángeles se dedica a la venta de ropa, la ubicación de su negocio es de manera ambulante por lo que así puede tener una gran variedad de clientes, juntas se han unido para mejorar sus ingresos y solicitar un crédito para sus negocios.
texts.en:
Maria De Los Ángeles and Ángela Mercedes comprise the solidarity group “Dios Nos Guía” (God Leads Us). Ángela has been selling candy for more than 15 years. Every day she goes out selling on the streets with great effort.

Maria De Los Ángeles sells clothing. She operates her business as a traveling merchant so that she can have a variety of customers.

These women have joined together to improve their income and request a loan for their businesses.

loans.use: Operating capital for selling candy & clothes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for home repairs

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Pay for home improvements

loans.name: Máximo Orlando

texts.es: El Sr. Máximo Orlando A. A. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa Ministerio de salud desempeñándose como guarda de seguridad tiene  dos  años  de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación,  los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Sr. Máximo Orlando A. A. is an active employee of the Ministry of Health, where he has worked as a security guard for the past two years. He has received two loans from CEPRODEL and each one was used to purchase construction materials such as sand, cement, stone, gravel, blocks, and other items in order to expand and improve his home.

The loans from CEPRODEL have been a great benefit since they have helped improve the living conditions of himself and his family.

loans.use: Purchase construction materials to expand & improve his home

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa S. is from the village of Calaca-an. She is 66 years old. Elsa is married and has 3 adult children. To make a living, Elsa cultivates rice to sell. Elsa has been engaged in her farming business for over 6 years and earns approximately 7,000 PHP a month.

In 2000, Elsa joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities. She has successfully repaid a previous loan of 20,000 PHP from PMPC. This previous loan was used to purchase fertilizers such as manure. 

Elsa is requesting a new loan of 10000 PHP, which will be used to pay for services to increase her crop yield. This loan will be the 15th loan taken out by Elsa from PMPC. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions for her family. 

About PMPC:

Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC is one of the most progressive cooperatives in northwestern Mindanao. It reaches out to the rural poor using the Grameen model.

*Note: To maximize efficiency and reduce costs, this loan was posted using a template to automate the translation by Kiva.  Given that manual translation of entrepreneur profiles is costly, Kiva created this template for our Field Partner to allow them to continue to post loans in English while providing quality and accurate information to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: To pay for services to increase crop yield

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: Purchase construction materials to expand & improve his home

loans.name: Mrs. Suos Thoeun Village Bank Group

texts.en:
This village bank loan consists of nine people from Thnoas village in Takeo province. Mrs. Suos T., born in 1979, was selected to be the president of this group.  The members will use their portion of the loan for different purposes to improve their family living. 

Mrs. Suos T. is a farmer who owns a 2-hectare plot of land where she grows rice to sell to support her family.  Her husband is a construction worker and a fisherman. At the present, she wants to breed a cow, but her savings are not enough to buy one. To achieve her purpose, Mrs. Suos T. is applying for a loan to buy a cow for breeding to start a new business. 

Mrs. Suos T. is a mother of two children, who are both enrolled in the local public school.   Pha Nget is a group guarantor, so she is presented in the picture.

loans.use: To buy a cow

loans.name: Franklin David

texts.es: El Sr. Franklin David C. R. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa “Alcaldía Municipal Villa el Carmen” desempeñándose como Técnico de Catastro tiene dos años de trabajar para esta institución, tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc.  Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Franklin David C. R. is an employee of the "Villa El Carmen Municipal Township," where he works as a land registry technician. He has been working there for two years and he has one school-age son. He has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL, both of which he used to buy construction materials like sand, cement, stone, gravel, cinder blocks, etc. in order to expand and improve his house. The loans from CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to him because they have made it possible for him to improve his and his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials like sand, cement, and stone

loans.name: Eddy Iván

texts.es: El Sr. Eddy Iván F. M. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa “Alcaldía Municipal Villa el Carmen” desempeñándose como Técnico de Titulación y Relaciones Internacionales tiene  dos años  de trabajar para esta institución. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc.  Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Eddy Iván F. M. currently works for the "Municipal Township of Villa el Carmen." He has worked there as a Certification and International Relations Technician for two years. He has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL, both of which he has used to buy construction materials like sand, cement, stone, gravel, cinder blocks, etc. in order to expand and improve his home. The loans he has received through CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to him because they have made it possible for him to improve his and his family's living conditions. [Click here to see one of Eddy's previous loans on Kiva.]

loans.use: to buy construction materials like sand, cement, and stone

loans.name: Michel Joaquín

texts.es: El Sr. Michel Joaquín E. C. él es trabajador activo de la Empresa “Alcaldía Municipal Villa el Carmen” desempeñándose como Bodeguero tiene  dos años  de trabajar para esta institución, tiene un hijo en edad escolar. Ha tenido  dos créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno los ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como Arena, Cemento, Piedra, Piedrín, Bloques etc.  Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera el ha  mejorado su condición de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en: Mr. Michel Joaquín E. C. is an active worker in the Municipality of Villa el Carmen, where he works as a shopkeeper. He has been working there for two years and has one school-age son. He has taken out two loans through CEPRODEL, both of which he has used to buy construction materials like sand, cement, stone, gravel, cinder blocks, etc. in order to expand and improve his home. The loans he has received through CEPRODEL have been of great benefit to him because they have made it possible for him to improve his and his family's living conditions. [To see one of Michel's previous loans on Kiva, click here.]

loans.use: to buy construction materials like sand, cement, and stone

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: personal expenses; to pay off some debts

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials like corrugated metal roofing, tiles, etc. (to replace the roof of her house)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials like sand, cement, cinder blocks, and iron

loans.name: María Luisa

texts.es: La Sra. María Luisa G.  ella es Pensionada es casada actualmente. Ha tenido  once  créditos con CEPRODEL y cada uno lo ha realizado para la compra de materiales de construcción como, Arena, Cemento, piedra, piedrín etc. Para ampliar y mejorar su casa de habitación y este lo está solicitando para sufragar unos gastos personales de su hogar, los cuales los créditos con ceprodel le ha beneficiado en gran manera ya que de esta manera ella ha  mejorado su condición de vida de ella y su familia.
texts.en: Ms. María Luisa G. is retired and married. She has taken out eleven loans through CEPRODEL, each of which she has used to buy construction materials like sand, cement, stone, gravel, etc., in order to expand and improve her house. She is requesting this loan to cover some personal household expenses. The previous CEPRODEL loans she received have improved her and her family's quality of life.

loans.use: personal expenses

loans.name: Gulchahira

texts.en:
Gulchahira R.  is 46 years old. She was born into a family of farmers and since childhood has been engaged in cattle breeding. Gulchahira married early and became the mother of four children.  Her  family is very united, where all members help and support each other.

To find a means of subsistence for her family, Gulchahira began her business in cattle breeding and land cultivating. Owing to her wide experience in these  activities, she managed to develop her farm successfully.  Currently, she grows barley and clover, and has two cows on her farm whose milk she sells to the local dairy farm.  

With the revenue from these activities, Gulchahira was able to give her children a good education. Now, Gulchahira plans to use this loan for 50,000 KGS to purchase two bull calves to fatten and resell. With the revenue from this investment, she plans to give a dowry to her daughter. 

In the future, Gulchahira plans to maintain a big farm with a large number of cattle. 

Bai-Tushum and Partners uses Kiva funding to target the especially vulnerable population. Bai-Tushum and Partners is one of the leading Microfinance Institutions in Kyrgyzstan. As a reliable financial partner, Bai-Tushum contributes to the economic development of the Kyrgyz Republic through the delivery of microfinance services in rural and urban areas that lead to increased employment and meet the interests of its clients and investors.

loans.use: To purchase two bull calves

loans.name: Irvin

texts.es:
Irvin tiene 20  años de edad, es soltero y reside en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito de la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, caracterizado por que sus pobladores se dedican principalmente al cultivo de frutas.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino, los cuales cría en un lugar cercano a su casa.  Él los engorda con alimento balanceado y cuando ya están en un estado de desarrollo adecuado, los vende a sus vecinos de la zona y a los comerciantes que llegan al lugar. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Irvin siempre se esfuerza para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente él desea comprar más alimento balanceado para su ganado. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Irvin is 20 years old, single, and lives in the district of Tambogrande, which is in the province and region of Piura. This area is characterized by the fact that most of the people there cultivate fruit.

Irvin raises sheep, which he keeps near his house. He fattens them with a balanced diet and when they are adequately developed, he sells them to his neighbors or to the merchants who arrive in their area. This works makes it possible for him to help with his family's daily needs.

Irvin is always working to help his family get ahead. At the moment, he would like to buy more well-balanced food for his animals. For this reason, he decided to request a loan of 800 nuevos soles from Edpyme Aternativa. This sum will help him meet his goal.

loans.use: to buy a balanced diet for his animals

loans.name: Luis Ernan

texts.es:
Luis tiene 23 años de edad, es soltero y vive junto a sus padres y hermanos  en el distrito de Tambogrande, un distrito de la provincia de Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, caracterizado por que sus pobladores se dedican principalmente al cultivo de frutas.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado ovino y vacuno, los cuales cría en un lugar cercano a su casa.  Él los engorda con alimento balanceado y cuando ya están en un estado de desarrollo adecuado, los vende a sus vecinos de la zona y a los comerciantes que llegan al lugar. Esta actividad le permite obtener dinero para sus gastos personales y a la vez ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.  Luis es muy conocido en la zona donde reside, por lo que es apoyado por sus vecinos y amigos.

Luis siempre se esfuerza para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente él desea comprar más alimento balanceado para su ganado. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Luis is 23 years old, single, and lives with his parents and siblings in the district of Tambogrande, in the province and region of Piura. This area is characterized by the fact that most of the people there cultivate fruit.

Luis raises sheep and cattle, which he keeps at a location close to his house. He fattens them with a balanced diet and when they are adequately developed, he sells them to his neighbors or to the merchants who arrive in their area. This work allows him to earn money for his personal expenses, and at the same time, to help his family with its daily needs. Luis is very well known in the area where he lives, so he is supported by his neighbors and friends.

Luis is always working to help his family get ahead. At the moment, he would like to buy more well-balanced food for his cows. For this reason, he decided to request a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Aternativa. This sum will help him meet his goal.

loans.use: to provide his animals with a balanced diet

loans.name: Zenaida

texts.es:
Zenaida, tiene 34 años de edad, es soltera y reside junto a su madre en el distrito de Pítipo, ubicado a 1 hora la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza de animales menores, específicamente de ganado caprino.  Ella los cría al aire libre y eventualmente les compra pasto para alimentarlos.  Cuando han alcanzado un buen desarrollo los ofrece en venta a los negociantes de la zona y en el mercado de las ciudades de Ferreñafe y Batangrande.

Ella desea adquirir más animales para poder ampliar su negocio y aumentar su nivel de ventas, lo que hará que obtenga una mejor calidad de vida.  Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 1700 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Zenaida is 34 years old and single.  She lives with her mother in the Pítipo district, which is one hour from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

She raises small animals.  Specifically speaking, she raises goats.  She raises them in the open air, and she later buys fodder for them to feed on.  When they have reached a good stage of development, she sells them to the merchants in the area and at the markets in the cities of Ferreñafe and Batangrande.

She wishes to get more animals in order to be able to expand her business and increase her level of sales.  That will make for a better quality of life.  That is why she believes it is advisable to request a loan for 1,700 soles from Edpyme Alternative.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for her animals

loans.name: Maria Consuelo

texts.es:
María tiene 31 años D. edad, es casada y vive junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos  en el distrito D. TambogranD., un distrito D. la provincia D. Piura, en la región del mismo nombre, caracterizado por que sus pobladores se dedican principalmente al cultivo D. frutas.

Se dedica a la crianza D. ganado ovino, los cuales cría en un lugar cercano a su casa.  Élla los engorda con alimento balanceado y cuando ya están en un estado D. desarrollo adecuado, los venD. a sus vecinos D. la zona y a los comerciantes que llegan al lugar. Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento D. su economía diaria.  Asimismo se dedica a la agricultura, sembrando principalmente limón.  El limón lo cosecha y es vendido a sus vecinos, quienes compran por ser productos D. buena calidad.

María siempre se esfuerza para poder sacar adelante a su familia. Actualmente él desea comprar más alimento balanceado para su ganado. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 2000 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
María is 31 years old and married.  She lives with her husband and their four children in the TambogranD. district in the Piura province in the region with the same name.  It is noted for its inhabitants that primarily grow fruit.

She raises sheep in a place close to her house.  She fattens them with balanced feed.  When they have reached an adequate level of development, she sells them to her neighbors in the area and to the merchants who come to her place.  This business activity allows her to help her family with the daily expenses.

She also devotes herself to farming.  She primarily grows lemons.  She harvests the lemons, and then sells them to her neighbors.  They buy her products because of the good quality.

María always works hard to be able to get her family ahead.  She currently wishes to buy more balanced feed for her livestock.  That is why she believes it is advisable to request a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternative.  That will help her achieve her objective.

loans.use: To buy balanced feed for her livestock

loans.name: Rolando

texts.es:
Rolando tiene 26 años, es soltero y vive con sus padres en el distrito de San José, ubicado a menos de 1 hora de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, el cual es ordeñado, y la leche es vendida a los vecinos de la zona.  Él los engorda con alimento balanceado, para que la leche que produzcan sea de buena calidad y de aceptación por su clientela.  Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Rolando desea adquirir más animales para poder ampliar su negocio y aumentar su nivel de ventas, lo que hará que obtenga una mejor calidad de vida.  Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.

Él ya ha tenido un crédito financiado por el fondo Kiva a través de Edpyme Alternativa y su producto Capital Semilla. En aquella oportunidad él compró más materiales para fortalecer su negocio. Por ello se encuentra bastante agradecido con los prestamistas de Kiva que le ayudaron en esta acción.
texts.en:
Rolando is 26 years old and single.  He lives with his parents in the San José district.  It is located less than an hour from the city of Chiclayo, the capital of the Lambayeque region.

He raises cows.  They are milked, and the milk is sold to the neighbors in the area.  He fattens the cows with balanced feed so that the milk they produce is of a good quality and that it meets with his customers’ approval.  This business activity allows him to help his family with the daily finances.

Rolando wishes to get more animals in order to be able to expand his business and increase his level of sales.  That will give him a better quality of life.  That is why he believes it is advisable to request a loan for 1,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

He has had one loan from Kiva through Edpyme Alternativa and its Seed Capital Product.  He used that opportunity to buy more materials to strengthen his business.  He is very grateful to the Kiva lenders who helped him to do this.

loans.use: To buy cows to milk

loans.name: Luis Leonardo

texts.es:
Luis tiene 33 años de edad, es casado y vive con su familia en el distrito de Olmos, perteneciente a la provincia de Lambayeque. La zona es conocida en la zona norte del país por el cultivo del fruto llamado limón.

Él se dedica al transporte.  Tiene como vehículo a un mototaxi (vehículo que consiste en una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior).  Luis es muy conocido en la zona, por lo que la gente prefiere optar por el servicio que él brinda.  Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Luis desea reparar su mototaxi, ya que con el tiempo y el uso se ha venido deteriorando.  Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Luis is 33 years old. He is married and lives with his family in the Olmos district, which belongs to the province of Lambayeque. The area is known in the northern area of the country for growing lemons.  

He works in transportation. As a vehicle, he has motorcycle taxi (a vehicle that is made up of a motorcycle and a cabin to transport people inside).   Luis is well known in the area, and people prefer to use the service he offers. This activity allows him to help his family with support for their daily budget.

Luis wants to repair his motorcycle taxi, since it has deteriorated with use and over time. For this he has asked for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To maintain his transportation unit

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 72 años de edad, es conviviente y vive con su familia en el distrito de Olmos, perteneciente a la provincia de Lambayeque. La zona es conocida en la zona norte del país por el cultivo del fruto llamado limón.

Se dedica a trabajar en la agricultura desde que era joven. Cuenta con un pequeño terreno de cultivo en donde suele sembrar frutas como mango y limón. Cuando llega el tiempo de cosecha las comercializa con las plantas procesadoras de la zona. El negocio le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Juan siempre se esfuerza para poder sacar adelante su negocio. Actualmente desea aplicar a su terreno diversos fertilizantes para lograr que las frutas que coseche a futuro se desarrollen de mejor modo. Por ello ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1500 nuevos soles que le ayuden a lograr su objetivo.
texts.en:
Juan is 72 years old. He is in a common law marriage and lives with his family in the Olmos district, which belongs to the province of Lambayeque. The area is known in the northern part of the country for growing lemons.  

He has worked in agriculture since he was young. He a small plot of cropland where he grows fruit such as mangos and lemons.  When harvest time comes, he sells to the processing plants in the area. The business allows him to help support his family's daily budget.

Juan always works hard to be able to get his business ahead. At present, he wants to apply different fertilizers to his land so that the fruit he harvests in the future will develop in the best way. That is why he has decided to ask Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to help him meet his goal.

loans.use: To buy fertilizers for his land.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
Juan tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y vive con su familia en el distrito de Paiján, perteneciente a la Libertad, a 4 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.

Él se dedica al transporte.  Tiene como vehículo a un mototaxi (vehículo que consiste en una moto y una cabina para movilizar personas en su interior).  Juan es muy conocido en la zona, por lo que la gente prefiere optar por el servicio que él brinda.  Esta actividad le permite ayudar a su familia con el sostenimiento de su economía diaria.

Juan desea reparar su mototaxi, ya que con el tiempo y el uso se ha venido deteriorando.  Para ello ha creído conveniente solicitar un crédito de 750 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa.
texts.en:
Juan is 37 years old. He is married and lives with his family in the Paiján district, which belongs to La Libertad,  4 hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region.

He works in transportation. He has a motorcycle taxi as a vehicle (a vehicle that is made up of a motorcyle and a cabin to transport people in). Juan is well known in the area, and people prefer to use his service. This activity allows him to help support his family in its daily budget.  

Juan wants to repair his motorcyle taxi, since with use and over time is has deteriorated. For this he has decided to ask for a loan of 750 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.

loans.use: To maintain his transportation unit

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Бобохонов Нурали проживает в районе Вахдат. Возраст, 36 лет. Женат. Имеет 4 детей. Жена, домохозяйка. Сам Нурали занимается растениеводством. При доме имеет земельный участок, где сеет пшеницу для продажи. Этим видом деятельности занимается 7 лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nurali B. lives in the Vahdat district.  He is 36 years old, married and has 4 children.  His wife is a homemaker.  Nurali is involved in agriculture.  He has a land plot by his house where he plants wheat for sale.  He has been involved in this business for 7 years.  He is requesting this loan for the purchase of seeds and mineral fertilizers.

loans.use: Purchase of seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Ntamu

texts.en:
Ntamu is a married woman with four children, two of whom had graduated while two are still attending school. She owns a house that has piped water but no electricity. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

She has been operating a retail shop business for the past three years, selling at the market to her neighbours and passersby. Ntamu faces a major challenge in the seasonality of demands. During rainy season, the demand for her products is lower compared to hot summer season where the demand is higher. She hopes to establish a wholesale shop in the future.

With the 20,000  Kshs, she wants to purchase bundles of maize flour and cereals for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to run her business.

loans.use: To purchase maize flour and cereals for resale

loans.name: Mesalim

texts.en:
MeS. is a single woman who owns a house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is food for the family.

She operates a boutique shop, selling retail to her neighbouring community.  MeS. faces a major challenge in the high cost of transportation to her place of operation. She hopes to establish real estate agency in the future.

With the  20,000 Kshs, she wants to purchase ladies dresses and Kikoi's for sale. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to improve her business.

loans.use: To purchase ladies dresses and Kikoi's for resale

loans.name: Gulinor

texts.ru: Азизова Гулинор жительница Вахдатского района. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем, имеет 6 детей. Её муж находится в России. Сама она имеет среднее образования. Уже десять лет как занимается животноводством. Она в основном разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа скота, чтобы увеличить их количество.
